resources.string: The WorkWell application is designed to support and enhance ergonomic wellness through guided exercises and posture correction tools. However, it is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment to existing medical conditions.
How stiff or restricted did your body feel?
How much discomfort or pain did you feel during the session?
How difficult did you find completing the exercises?
How aware were you of your posture during the session?

"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat."

WorkWell is built to transform the way you care for your posture and well-being in a world that keeps you seated for hours. Whether you\'re working, gaming, or creating, our app is your companion in staying aligned, reducing discomfort, and fostering a healthier, more energized you.

WorkWell envisions a world where posture care is seamlessly integrated into daily life, empowering individuals to maintain optimal alignment, reduce discomfort, and enhance overall well-being. We strive to create a future where technology and wellness converge.
“Better Posture Less Strain.\nLive Healthier with WorkWell.”

WorkWell is dedicated to fostering a culture of movement, mindfulness, and proactive well-being in an increasingly sedentary world. We believe that small, consistent changes in posture and daily habits can lead to significant improvements in comfort, productivity, and overall health.

We are a team of dedicated and passionate individuals who came together to build WorkWell. Driven by curiosity and a desire to create meaningful solutions, we collaborated to develop an intuitive and user-friendly application. Through continuous learning and teamwork, we strive to make technology more accessible and helpful for everyone.
“Thank you for choosing WorkWell. Here’s to smarter posture, better movement, and a more exciting work experience!”
Feel free to reach out to us with any questions or feedback. Work comfortably!
Log in to WorkWell app to access your personalized routines.
It provides users with essential details about their daily exercise routine and personal information.
The Routine Tab displays your assigned exercise. You can start current routine by tapping Start Routine, while past routines serve as a reference for progress tracking.
You will see exercises included in your selected routine, each with a View Instructions button to check detailed steps before performing them.

It provides a video guide, a reference link, and step-by-step instructions for performing the exercise and setting up your device. A disclaimer clarifies that WorkWell is a guidance tool, not a medical treatment.
Tracks your completed routines, showing the routine name, date, and time of completion. You can tap See Details to review each session.

This page includes you recorded video after the exercise, along with ratings for stiffness, pain, difficulty, and awareness. It also features a reflection section for personal notes and doctor’s comments with feedback on performance.
It provides access to account details, information about the app, and a user guide. A log-out button is available at the bottom for easy sign-out.
It provides a quick overview of the user\'s profile information.
This page introduces WorkWell, explaining its purpose, vision, and brand statement. It also highlights the developers behind the app and provides contact information for inquiries.
This section of the WorkWell app provides users with essential guidance on navigating the app and utilizing its features effectively.
Decreasing threshold of pose detect results button
Increasing threshold of pose detect results button
Click + to add an image or a video to begin running the pose landmarker.
